text: 12|45|(yusuhpin cirait) tolarkal iruvaril vitutalai ataintavan pala antukalukkup pinnar (accamayam avarai) ninaittu (avar tan kanavukkuk kuriya viyakkiyanam murrilum carivara nataiperrataiyum enni, aracarai nokki) â€˜â€˜aracaratu kanavin viyakkiyanattai nan unkalukku arivikka mutiyum. Ennai (ciraik kutattilulla yusuhpitam) anuppivaiyunkal'' enru kurinan. (Avvare aracarum yusuhpitam avanai anuppivaittar)
